content: // Edge-tangent polytope and the sphere of edge tangencies// David Eppstein, UC Irvine, 21 May 2001global_settings {   assumed_gamma 2.2   ambient_light <2,2,2>}light_source { <25, -5, -15> color <2,2,2> }light_source { <5, -10, -15> color <1.5,1.5,1.5> }// perp: <5,1,-6> <1,1,1> <7,-11,4>// perp: <5,2,-2> <0,1,1> <4,-5,5>#declare p=<1,1,1>/sqrt(3)#declare q=<7,-11,4>/sqrt(186)camera {   location  <5,1,-6>   look_at   <0, 0, 0>   up -q*0.65   right p*0.65   translate <-0.1,0,-0.5>   rotate <0,-5,0>}sphere { <0.0, 0.0, 0.0>, 2	texture {		finish {			specular 1			roughness 0.001			ambient 0.05			diffuse 0.01			reflection 0.5			phong 0.3			phong_size 60		}		pigment { color rgbf<0.7, 0.2, 1.0, 0.7> }	}}#declare P_Surf =texture {    finish {       ambient 0.2       diffuse 0.2    }    pigment { color red 1 green 1 blue 1 }}polygon {    4,    <0,2,-2>,<0,2,2>,<2,0,1>,<2,0,-1>    texture { P_Surf }}polygon {    4,    <0,2,-2>,<0,2,2>,<-2,0,1>,<-2,0,-1>    texture { P_Surf }}polygon {    4,    <0,-2,-2>,<0,-2,2>,<2,0,1>,<2,0,-1>    texture { P_Surf }}polygon {    4,    <0,-2,-2>,<0,-2,2>,<-2,0,1>,<-2,0,-1>    texture { P_Surf }}polygon {	3,	<0,2,2>,<2,0,1>,<0,-2,2>	texture { P_Surf }}polygon {	3,	<0,2,-2>,<2,0,-1>,<0,-2,-2>	texture { P_Surf }}polygon {	3,	<0,2,2>,<-2,0,1>,<0,-2,2>	texture { P_Surf }}polygon {	3,	<0,2,-2>,<-2,0,-1>,<0,-2,-2>	texture { P_Surf }}#declare P_Ring =texture {    finish {       ambient 0.3       diffuse 0.3    }    pigment { color red 1 green 0 blue 1/2 }}torus {	2/sqrt(2), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <-45,0,0>	translate <0,1,-1>}torus {	2/sqrt(2), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <45,0,0>	translate <0,1,1>}torus {	2/sqrt(2), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <-45,0,0>	translate <0,1,-1>	rotate <180,0,0>}torus {	2/sqrt(2), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <45,0,0>	translate <0,1,1>	rotate <180,0,0>}torus {	2*sqrt(1/5), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <90,-asin(2/sqrt(5))*180/pi,0>	translate <8/5,0,-4/5>}torus {	2*sqrt(1/5), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <90,asin(2/sqrt(5))*180/pi,0>	translate <8/5,0,4/5>}torus {	2*sqrt(1/5), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <90,-asin(2/sqrt(5))*180/pi,0>	translate <8/5,0,-4/5>	rotate <180,0,0>}torus {	2*sqrt(1/5), 0.02	texture { P_Ring }	rotate <90,asin(2/sqrt(5))*180/pi,0>	translate <8/5,0,4/5>	rotate <180,0,0>}
